name: Undead Carnage League
summary:
A virus broke out of the inner cities, zombies spread across the planet, and now… life’s pretty boring. What do you do for fun in a post-apocalyptic world? Jump in your car and join the Undead Carnage League.
Join the elite zombie smashers, hit the road and run down as many of the drooling mindless horde as you can, grabbing their gold teeth and avoiding obstacles and zombie rockets. The more gold teeth you collect, the more choices you have to upgrade to some sweet new wheels. Compete against other dangerous drivers and throw them off course with your own explosive ammo to top the global leaderboard for the highest honour - the Undead Carnage League trophy.
